entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers this morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Thursday 27 April 2023
